title: Requesting a region for Asia
body: Can Riot add a region for Asian Players with low ping?????

replies.body:
Not an Asian server, we already have a number of Asian servers. 
I think the more accurate name is a South-East Asia. 
SEA server. 

#**SEA** 

Singapore would probably hold the server. 
Riot needs a bigger playerbase in the Philippines. DOTA and Dota 2 dominates the country and the incredible skill needed for this game could bring a lot of Filipino player's mechanics to the spotlight if some turn to League of Legends.
yes. Can you guys add servers for countries like singapore & India?
They Do. But playing with 200-400 ping  is not so good.
http://lol.garena.com/home This is the SEA server
